messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 1/6/2003 10:36:43 PM Central Standard Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:

>
> Get into the Yahoo groups section on the yahoo website.
> Click on or find Unschooling-dotcom, since you ARE a member. ;-)
> Go into Messages.
> In the upper right section, there is a little box that you can input a
> message # to go to.
> Enter in #38139, press "go".
> It should take you right there.
> Ned (and Luz) went by the screen name Ned Vare and Luz Shozie.
> His website is http://www.borntoexplore.org
>
> Karin


Karin thanks so much.......


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
